title: Shortest Distance to a Character - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given a string S and a character C, return an array of integers representing the shortest distance from the character C in the string. Example 1: Input: S = "loveleetcode", C = 'e'
Output: [3, 2, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 2, 2, 1, 0]

title: Number of Lines To Write String - String - Easy - LeetCode
content: We are to write the letters of a given string S, from left to right into lines. title: Rotate String - String - Easy - LeetCode
content:
We are given two strings, A and B.
A shift on A consists of taking string A and moving the leftmost character to the rightmost position. For example, if A = 'abcde', then it will be 'bcdea' after one shift on A. Return True if and only if A can become B after some number of shifts on A.</p

title: Relative Ranks - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:

content:
